options.name: Parsnip Soup
options.description: With chestnut, pear, parsley & white truffle oil, served with toasted sourdough baguette

options.name: Smoked Salmon Tartare
options.description: On marinated beetroot with citrus crème fraîche & dill, served with toasted sourdough baguette

options.name: Duck Rillettes
options.description: Shredded, slow-cooked duck with wholegrain mustard, rosemary, cornichons & pickled shallots, served with toasted sourdough baguette

options.name: Pear & Bayonne Ham Salad
options.description: With golden beetroot, watercress & rosemary croutons, drizzled with a Roquefort dressing & smoked walnuts

options.name: Prawn Thermidor
options.description: King prawns cooked in a lobster mornay sauce with Comté cheese, an apple & herb garnish & toasted sourdough baguette

options.name: Sea Bream Grenobloise
options.description: Served with a brown butter, lemon, caper & parsley sauce, creamed potatoes, braised fennel, cherry tomatoes & rosemary croutons

options.name: Butternut Squash Pithivier
options.description: Mushroom, butternut squash & goat's cheese puff pastry parcel, served with sage gratin dauphinois, braised red cabbage, French beans, Tenderstem broccoli, Chantenay carrots & cranberry jus

options.name: Turkey Paupiette
options.description: British turkey breast with pork & apricot stuffing wrapped in streaky bacon. Served with sage gratin dauphinois, braised red cabbage, French beans, Tenderstem broccoli, Chantenay carrots & cranberry jus

options.name: Mushroom Bourguignon
options.description: Slow-cooked Façon mushrooms in red wine, vegan bacon, baby onions & Chantenay carrots, with creamed potatoes

options.name: Sirloin
options.description: Cut, trimmed and prepared in the Côte butchery. Served with frites & watercress. Recommended medium rare

options.name: Pain Perdu
options.description: A sweet brioche bread pudding with cream, salted caramel sauce & vanilla ice cream

options.name: Winter Spiced Crème Brûlée
options.description: Burnt vanilla cream infused with star anise, cinnamon, ginger & nutmeg, topped with pomegranate seeds

options.name: White Chocolate Mousse
options.description: In a dark chocolate sphere layered with a winter berry compote & freeze-dried raspberries, served with a warm lemon madeleine
